Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel in the heart of Venice”
Reviews.Author: atoorva
Reviews.Content: budget hotel family run location friendly staff clean comfortable 5 min walk piazza san mark surrounded shops nice bakeries bars nearby breakfast fair spread options vegetarian wifi

Reviews.Content: italy rick steves tour couple ago venice florence rome hotel stayed venice leg trip little perfect getting hotel isnt easy getting hotel venice isnt easy unless staying transportation hub train station station etc venetian island airport bus island walked bit closest station rialto bridge walk ten minutes hotel serenissima forever gotten international flight tired cranky hungry brush teeth hotel warmly greeted front desk clerk lovely woman suitcases upstairs hall bathroom wouldnt ready hours able leave bags freshen begin wonderful adventure venice hotel gem initial shock probably jet lag talking realized central location couple blocks st marks square rialto bridge gondola station corner opera house typical squares city pefect location factor time takes leave airport functional travel partner stayed double meaning twin beds wardrobe decent sized bathroom located floor overlooking quiet square hotel lovely flowers watch owners golden retriever sleepy play beautiful murano glass chandelier chandelier lovely breakfast included stay rick steves tour extra youre tour wasnt fancy pastry yogurt fruit juice coffee perfect breakfast plan morning taking sites laundry facility plan stay days clothes entire stay head nearest laundrymat fair little walk bathroom functional bathtub bidet sink regular toilet recommend stay hotel own soap trip europe maybe own towell towels skimpy bars soap tiny hotel located charming street close oh forgot mention burger king corner miss american food believe people eating dont understand highly recommend hotel stay venice stay chain hotels arent located island transportation closes evening totally miss st marks square gondola ride night plan husband venice day definitely stay location friendly owners clean affordable whats love

Reviews.Title: “charming little hotel, perfect location”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights 3 ago lovely memories hotel super location wonderful magic town venice thanks description placed tripadvisor walked straight hotel arriving morning vaporetto airport luckily allready waiting friendly staff charming french windows overlooking street below near sights loved breakfast tea coffee orange juice bread crackers yoghurt fruit started romantic stay romantic town

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Katiel7
Reviews.Content: hotel extremely charming found nicely appointed beds extremely comfortable italy found hard mattresses norm cities family runs hotel extremely helpful questions directions definitely handy venice location wonderful minutes st marks square rialto bridge vapporetto stations shops restaurants close hotel quiet breakfast warm croissants delicious wonderful stay venice allowing experience charm beautiful city offer extravagant price tag look forward returning soon

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location for the price!”
Reviews.Author: robsarahsadventures
Reviews.Content: comfortable hotel especially price fantastic location rialto bridge st marks square hotel staff extremely helpful friendly breakfast adequate fruit juice bread rolls croissants jam coffee etc clean bathroom immaculate fresh towels day couldnt fault hotel wasnt lift shower head bath curtain bath didnt detract enjoyable holiday definitely stay ifwhen return venice

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”

Reviews.Content: location star hotel 5 minute walk rialto bridge st marks square double comfortable clean decent shower staff friendly helpful basic hotel recommend stay heart venice

Reviews.Content: serenissima centrally located family operated hotel mama runs kitchen helps breakfast time friendly family dog hangs single expected europe standards bed comfortable bathroom elevators wifi access 35 euros breakfast mama serves rolls juice hotel centrally located near st marks square rialto bridge doge palace etc near shops restaurants
